statements: UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET equipment_brand='Brand A' WHERE equipment_id=101;
UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET equipment_model='Model X', equipment_type='Type A' WHERE equipment_id=201;

UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET equipment_description='High-speed processor, large memory capacity', operation_manual='Refer to manual for details' WHERE equipment_id=2;
UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET equipment_name = 'Printer' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE OperationManuals SET manual_text = 'New manual text' WHERE manual_id = 5;
UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET equipment_name = 'Printer', description = 'High-speed printer for office use' WHERE equipment_id = 1
UPDATE OperationManuals SET manual_text = 'http://example.com/printer_manual' WHERE equipment_id = 1
UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET brand = 'ABC Corp' WHERE equipment_name = 'Excavator';
UPDATE TrainingSessions SET session_duration = 60, trainer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE equipment_id = 3;
UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET year_of_manufacture = 2020, brand = 'NewBrand' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE EquipmentSpecifications SET equipment_name = 'Machine A', equipment_type = 'Machine', specifications = 'Capacity: 100 units/hour' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
